TopicTitle: Anyone else missing ascending/desceding nodes or indications of SOI when doing maneuvers?

Articles.Content:
I've gotten to the Mun and Minmus and even to Eve, but over the last few days, I cannot get a to any planets due to having no information. Despite targeting Duna I have no ascending or descending nodes and I cannot get an encounter, or at least, I cannot get any indication of one. I've played enough KSP1 that I am pretty sure it is not user error.

Is anyone else having this issue?

I'm having it on occasion.

Did you have them previously and they stopped appearing ?
Sounds like a bug because I do have them every, or at least most of the time. When I targeted something that is.

On 3/5/2023 at 10:59 PM, pandaman said:

I'm having it on occasion.

Did you have them previously and they stopped appearing ?

Yes, I got to Eve no problem, but I have had no luck recently.

On 3/5/2023 at 11:00 PM, The Aziz said:

Sounds like a bug because I do have them every, or at least most of the time. When I targeted something that is.

I targeted Duna and nothing appeared. Usually, as soon as you target a planet or moon, you immediately get ascending and descending nodes.

1 hour ago, Klapaucius said:

I targeted Duna and nothing appeared. Usually, as soon as you target a planet or moon, you immediately get ascending and descending nodes.

Yup, same here. Duna soi points just won't show up. Maybe tomorrow they will, who knows. 

I do have the kerbin soi exit thing.
I ran into this today, I just reloaded the save and everything came back as it should.

Not sure if this is related or not, but while I can get intercept markers when going places, I am finding I can't get an actual encounter with SOI unless I do a fine-tune burn 1/3 of the way towards my destination.  That might be due to the maneuver nodes not being the greatest at the moment, but I find it odd that I have to do this.  I'm living with it, though, as I have no other choice.

On 3/5/2023 at 4:52 AM, Klapaucius said:

I've gotten to the Mun and Minmus and even to Eve, but over the last few days, I cannot get a to any planets due to having no information. Despite targeting Duna I have no ascending or descending nodes and I cannot get an encounter, or at least, I cannot get any indication of one. I've played enough KSP1 that I am pretty sure it is not user error.

Is anyone else having this issue?

I tried resetting my game, but it didnt work. the only way i could fix it is by making a new save. you need to delete that save. also, try winging it with the node , works for me!
